data.text: @JeffLudban @CDPHE nope you are just that important, and that’s saying alot, usually I  look at twatter every 5 days or so, you special
@firstcapriccio @CDPHE 3 days later.  Ok, thanks, bro.  Although you're probably just a flip phone in a North Korean warehouse
@WisdomLingersSH @AimingForZen2 @CDPHE Yeah that's great. Now that I've read your other stuff I'm not sure why you would call me a snarky edge lord. Best,
@AimingForZen2 @JeffLudban @CDPHE Well that settles it. Because there sure aren’t any empirical studies saying the opposite. Guess the only thing to do now is follow the money 🤔
@AimingForZen2 @WisdomLingersSH @CDPHE yikes ixnay ovidcay.  I'm trying to ditch these guys so I can go back to tweeting about mma and obscure rock bands

@WisdomLingersSH @CovidChihuaha @CDPHE so if you don't like something I put under the cdphe post.....great.  I don't like you.  Im not interested in your cult.  If I get called certain names...I tend to respond.  And, again, I'm not interested in a philosophical discussion with you

@WisdomLingersSH @CovidChihuaha @CDPHE well, no.  I made a crack about goofy, anonymous troll accts and was promptly addressed by 3 goofy anonymous troll accts.  At no time did I want to communicate with any of you. When you type the @ followed by my handle, you're "speaking" to me. I was not "speaking" to youse.
